credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
title: Guttus or Bird-shaped Flask
description: This guttus is similar to an example from Cyprus. Natural bluish-green glass shaped like a bird with pulled-out 'tail' and cylindrical neck folded up from body until perpendicular to it. Wide horizontal tooled rim. Concave base. Sliver missing from top of 'tail'. Slight iridescent film. Incrustation inside.
